ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Com.description: The comments model with the information to add.

jobName.description: The name of the job activity.

jobType.description: The type of the job activity.

jobStatus.description: The status of the job activity.

jobResult.description: The result of the job activity.

createdBy.description: The user who created the activity.

createdDate.description: The date the activity was created.

completionDate.description: The date the activity was completed.

fileId.description: Represents the file unique identifier. This value could be an int or a guid.

externalReference.description: Represents external reference that externally identifies object

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Act.description: Represents the model for the activity history descriptions.

title.description: The title of the description model.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Act.description: Represents the Activity History metadata item.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Ris.description: Serves as the Risk Snapshot job parameter model for SuccessFactors systems.

name.description: Represents the name of the job.

requestCreatedDate.description: Represents the date and time the request was created.

createdBy.description: Represents the user that is scheduling the job.

securityExtractId.description: Represents the security extract unique identifier.

useLiveExtract.description: Serves as a flag to determine if a live security is intended to be used.  When true, a security extract is created, otherwise, the SecurityExtractId  will be used.

notificationEmail.description: Represents the email of the user to be notified when the job is done.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the id of the current ERP system.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Parameters.description: Job Parameters are the parameters that are passed in to the job that determine how it executes.

name.description: Represents the name of the job.

jobId.description: Represents the f of the job.

accountId.description: Represents the id of the account.

sapSystemId.description: Represents the id of the ERP system.

createdBy.description: Represents the user who created the job.

updatedBy.description: Represents the user who updated the job.

requestCreatedDate.description: Represents the date the job request was created.

isRiskSnapshotJob.description: Represents a value indicating whether the job is a Risk Snapshot.

recurrenceId.description: Represents the id of the recurrence of the job.

isSignatureRequested.description: Represents whether or not the user requested this report to be signed with a certificate.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the unique erp system identifier.

email.description: Represents the email of the user to be notified when the job is done.

id.description: The unique identifier of the rule.

ruleCode.description: A value representing the rule code.

ruleName.description: A value representing the rule name.

ruleType.description: A value representing the rule type.  E.g.: SOD, SEN.

businessFunctionCodes.description: A value representing a comma separated list of business function codes associated with the rule.

objects.description: Represents the collection of objects assigned to this TCode.

name.description: The name of the TCode authorization object.

fields.description: A collection of TCode authorization fields.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Tra.description: Represents a TCode authorization object field.

name.description: The name of the authorization object field.

from.description: The starting value of the authorization object field.

to.description: The ending value of the authorization object field.

id.description: Represents the unique identifier for the business function.

accountId.description: Represents the id of the account the business function belongs to.

tCodes.description: Represents a collection of transaction codes associated with the ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Entities.BusinessFunction.TCodesCsv value.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Entities.E.description: Object model that represents an ERP system user.

userGroup.description: Represents the group this user is a part of.

email.description: Represents the email address of the user.

isEmployee.description: Represents a value indicating whether the user is an employee.

createdBy.description: Represents the name of the user who created this record.

createdDate.description: Represents the date this record was created.

isExpired.description: Represents a value specifying whether the user is expired.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Fil.description: Model for GetErpSystemRoles request with exclude roles assigned to specific users filter.

erpSystemId.description: ERP system ID.

excludeUserIds.description: Collection of user ids. The roles assigned to these users will be excluded from the result set.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Dtos.ErpSy.description: Object DTO that represents an ERP system role.

id.description: Represents the ERP system role unique identifier.

roleName.description: Represents the ERP system role name.

description.description: Represents a collection of ERP system role description.

roleLocationId.description: Represents the ERP system role location id.

roleLocationName.description: Represents the ERP system role location name.

refreshDescriptionFromErp.description: Represents a value indicating whether to refresh the description from the ERP system.

createdBy.description: Represents the user that created the ERP system role.

createdDate.description: Represents the date the ERP system role was created.

updatedBy.description: Represents the user that last updated the ERP system role.

updatedDate.description: Represents the date last updated the ERP system role.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Entities.S.description: Represents a security analysis result record.

id.description: Represents the id of the analysis result.

name.description: Represents the name of the analysis result.

analysisDate.description: Represents the date of the analysis result.

jobId.description: Represents the id of the job  to which the analysis result refers.

sourceExtractDate.description: Represents the date of the source extract.

fileName.description: Name of the Security Analysis file.

createdBy.description: The user who created the analysis.

createdDate.description: The date the analysis was created.

fileUri.description: Represents the URI of the file.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Off.description: Serves as the item used to model the security analysis.

analysisName.description: Represents the formatted name of the analysis.

extractDate.description: Represents the formatted name of the extract.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Models.Aut.description: Parameters model for the automated provisioning.

requiresRecurrenceJobParameters.description: Specifies whether the recurrence for the current agent command requires the job parameters. For example, under the current implementation of the agent's security extract, job parameters are not needed to be present in the recurrence record. Default value is true.

erpSystemId.description: Represents the id of the current ERP system.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Entities.S.description: Represents an entity for Secure Provisioning Request.

requestedFor.description: Name of the user for secure provisioning.

roleChangesSerialized.description: Represents serialized object with changed roles.

requestActivitiesSerialized.description: Represents serialized object with request activities.

createdBy.description: Name of the user that created request.

updatedBy.description: Name of the user that updated request last time.

enableManagerApprovals.description: Determines if request if enabled for approval by manager.

ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Entities.P.description: Represents the program command instance entity.

name.description: Represents the recurrence name.

recurrenceType.description: Represents the recurrence type.  IMPORTANT: This was changed from ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Enumerations.RecurrenceType to System.String  due to technical constrains with OData filters. It should not be considered the norm.

createdBy.description: Represents the user who created the recurrence.

updatedBy.description: Represents the user who updated the recurrence.

timeZone.description: Represents the recurrence time zone description.

lastRunDate.description: Represents the recurrence last run date.

nextRunDate.description: Represents the recurrence next run date.

type.description: IMPORTANT: This was changed from ErpMaestro.JobServices.Common.Enumerations.RecurrenceType to System.String  due to technical constrains with OData filters. It should not be considered the norm.

useLiveUtilizationExtracts.description: Represents a value indicating whether to use  live utilization extracts.

monthsOfUtilizations.description: Represents the number of months of utilizations to use for the job.

securityExtractId.description: Represents the id of the security extract to use for the job.

useLiveExtract.description: Represents a value indicating whether to use a live extract.

rulebookIds.description: Represents a collection of the rulebook ids to use for the job.

includeAdminLockedUsers.description: // Represents a value indicating whether to include users locked by an admin.

includeDialog.description: // Represents a value indicating whether to include dialog users.

includeReference.description: // Represents a value indicating whether to include reference users.

includeService.description: // Represents a value indicating whether to include service users.

includeSystem.description: // Represents a value indicating whether to include system users.
